refnamediv.refpurpose: Set default scale parameter for all bc math functions

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function sets the default scale parameter for all subsequent bc math functions that do not explicitly specify a scale parameter.

example.title: bcscale example
example.programlisting:
<?php

// default scale : 3
bcscale(3);
echo bcdiv(105, 6.55957); // 16.007

// this is the same without bcscale()
echo bcdiv(105, 6.55957, 3); // 16.007

?>
